title: New Tracing & Hash Computation Does Not Apply to Non-TaskHost Worker Nodes
body:
The following trace does not apply to non-taskhost msbuild worker nodes:

https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/src/Shared/CommunicationsUtilities.cs#L665

Other potential areas the trace logic should move to:
https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/src/Build/BackEnd/Components/Communications/NodeProviderOutOfProc.cs#L78

https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/master/src/Build/BackEnd/Components/Communications/NodeProviderOutOfProc.cs#L93

Pairs with #4960
